survey_name: Employee Engagement and Job Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to measure employee engagement levels and job satisfaction within the organization to identify areas for improvement and enhance workplace morale.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current job role?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the scale is balanced with neutral as midpoint.
